    #include<stdio.h>
    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
     
    int test,c,i,temp,n;
    int min=1000000001;
    long long sum=0;
    cin>>test;
    while(test){
    test--;
    sum=0;
    cin>>n;
    min=1000000001;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    scanf("%d",&c);
    sum+=c;
    //cout<<"sum:"<<sum<<" I:"<<i<<"\n";
    temp=sum/(i+1);
    //cout<<"temp:"<<temp<<"\n";
    if(min>temp)min=temp;
    //cout<<"new min:"<<min<<"\n";
    }
     
    cout<<min<<"\n";
    }
     
     
     
     
    }
